name: Netdots 1
description:
A dynamic network of dots that leave traces as they travel under both an overal repulsive force and a nearest-neighbor attractive force. Created on August 16, 2021. Made in R with {ggplot2} and the simulation package {particles}. PNG, 3600 x 3600 pixels.

Website:
https://clauswilke.com/art/project/netdots

Author:
